titles.title: The Vision of a Mother's Heart

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: The Vision of a Mother's Heart

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: In the heart of every mother

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Is a place that God has made

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Where she can lay up precious treasures

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Of the kind that will not fade

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Precious memories of her children

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: Gathered up mid daily cares

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: When she kneels before the Father

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: They’re the subject of her prayers

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: For she sees them ever changing

verse.name: v11
verse.lines: And their eyes are filled with dreams

verse.name: v12
verse.lines: And when she kneels beside their beds at night

verse.name: v13
verse.lines: How close the future seems

verse.name: v14
verse.lines: The vision of a mother’s heart

verse.name: v15
verse.lines: Is to share with her children the love only Jesus can give

verse.name: v16
verse.lines: Is to see them all walking with God everyday that they live

verse.name: v17
verse.lines: Oh, a mother needs a vision

verse.name: v18
verse.lines: Yes, she needs to see beyond

verse.name: v19
verse.lines: The daily round of household duties for those days are swiftly gone

verse.name: v20
verse.lines: All the years will seem like moments

verse.name: v21
verse.lines: When she turns around to see

verse.name: v22
verse.lines: And will the ways she has spent her time matter in eternity?

verse.name: v23
verse.lines: She must fill their days with laughter

verse.name: v24
verse.lines: She must fill their eyes with love

verse.name: v25
verse.lines: She must fill their hearts and minds

verse.name: v26
verse.lines: With the knowledge from above

verse.name: v27
verse.lines: He can be Your Jesus

verse.name: v28
verse.lines: Just let Him save You now...
